headline: Mag 7 market cap value surged on tariff pause news
summary: The "Magnificent Seven," made up of Nvidia (NVDA), Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Tesla (TSLA), Microsoft (MSFT), Amazon (AMZN), Meta (META), and Apple (AAPL), added over $1.8 trillion to their market capitalizations during the tariff pause–fueled stock rally on Wednesday. In this episode of Stocks in Translation, podcast host Jared Blikre dives deeper into the latest price action for large-cap tech names. Catch more Stocks in Translation here, with new episodes every Tuesday and Thursday. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Get diversified: 'Mag 7 will no longer be the Mag 7' in 5 years
summary: The "Magnificent Seven" has long since dominated markets (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) and investor focus, but that dominance may not last forever. Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company chief investment officer Brent Schutte joins Morning Brief to discuss the importance of diversifying investments and the likelihood that new leaders will emerge in the market in the coming years. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
